title: Astrology and Trump - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/27/17
itunes:title: Astrology and Trump - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/27/17
description:
George Noory and guest Heather Arielle discuss astrology and the cosmic links to the early struggles of the Trump administration and whether the prospects will improve for the President and the country.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
